original_text:
“Call now; is there anyone who will answer you?
    To which of the holy ones will you turn?
korean_text: 너는 부르짖어 보라 네게 응답할 자가 있겠느냐 거룩한 자 중에 네가 누구에게로 향하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: is there anyone who will answer you?
To which of the holy ones will you turn?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 거룩한 자들 중 누구에게로 향하겠느냐
